edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.resource_dao
Interface ResourceDataAccessObject

All Known Subinterfaces:
ResourceDataAccessObjectExtended
public interface ResourceDataAccessObject

Interface for the integration of any external resource. These methods are mandatory, they must all be implemented for any implementing class.

Version:
0.3
Author:
Collin McCormack (cmccorma), Tom Vu (tamv)

Method Detail

getEntities

java.util.Collection<Entity> getEntities(java.lang.String query)
General use Resource query method.

Parameters:
query - search terms
Returns:
Collection matching the query

getEntities

java.util.Collection<Entity> getEntities(java.lang.String query,
                                         boolean exactMatch)
Overloaded query method with option to only return an exact match to the query. This method is sometimes preferable to getEntities(query) as it will deliver much more relevant results (with exactMatch=true), often at the cost of recall (results are much narrower). Each implementation has a different method of making the comparison for an exact match and are documented as such.

Parameters:
query - search terms
exactMatch - boolean controlling the test for exact match to query
Returns:
Collection matching the query

getEntityById

Entity getEntityById(java.lang.String id)
Queries the resource using an id.

Parameters:
id - the id to look for
Returns:
An Entity matching the id

getEntityById

Entity getEntityById(java.lang.String id,
                     boolean exactMatch)
Overloaded method for querying the resource using an id, with the option to only return an exact match to the queried id. Each implementation has a different method of making the comparison for an exact match and are documented as such. In general, this method is much preferred to the more generic one as ID's should be unique to an Entity and a less than exact match may return an irrelevant result.

Parameters:
id - the id to look for
exactMatch - boolean controlling the test for exact match to id
Returns:
An Entity matching the id
